__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: More Fertilizer Options

pages.text: Given a greater need for fertilization in Firmalife, there are more options for getting $(l:mechanics/fertilizers)fertilizers$().
Thatch can be $(l:tfc:firmalife/drying)Dried$() into $(thing)Dry Grass$(), which can be used in a Composter as a brown item.
